feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-08-04T15:54:15.224399Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;（下一个丰富）</stitle>; <id>;https://clojure.org/news/2023/08/04/next-rich</id>; <更新>;2023- 08-04T14:53:39.819470Z</updated>; <link href="https://clojure.org/news/2023/08/04/next-rich"/>; <作者>; <name>;poidos</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=poidos</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我将从商业软件开发中退休并加入 Nubank。我将继续作为一名独立开发人员致力于维护和增强 Clojure。 Nubank 将继续引领 Datomic 的发展。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#next-rich" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=37000562" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;远程工作需要更多的沟通，但频率较低</stitle>; <id>;https://ben.balter.com/2023/08/04/remote-work-communicate-more-with-less/< /id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T15:02:39.917410Z</更新>; <link href="https://ben.balter.com/2023/08/04/remote-work-communicate-more-with -less/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;chmaynard </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=chmaynard</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;远程工作需要更多的沟通，但频率较低。远程工作人员不再采用持续的同步交互，而是采用异步形式的通信，例如写作或视频。这提高了通信的质量和清晰度以及整体吞吐量。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#remote-work-requires-communicating-more-but-less-frequently" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37000981" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何使用 GPT4 将 AI Code Copilot 添加到您的产品</stitle>; <id>;https://www.windmill.dev/blog/windmill- ai</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T14:58:39.920263Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.windmill.dev/blog/windmill-ai"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rubenfiszel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rubenfiszel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#how-to-add-an-ai-code-copilot-to-your-product-using-gpt4" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37000920" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LK-99室温常压磁悬浮成功</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.01516</id>; <已更新>;2023-08-04T01：53：39.921281Z </已更新>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.01516"/>; <作者>; <名称>;镜面</名称>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=spekular</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3 .4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;最近，Sukbae Lee等人报道了改性铅磷灰石晶体（LK-99）在室温下的大气超导性的鼓舞人心的实验结果。他们声称合成的LK-99材料表现出超导体的迈斯纳悬浮现象，超导转变温度 (Tc) 高于 400 K。 -of-lk-99" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36994214" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Rich Hickey 将从 Nubank 退休</ stitle>; <id>;https://building.nubank.com.br/clojures-journey-at-nubank-a-look-into-the-future/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T14:53： 39.922199Z</更新>; <link href="https://building.nubank.com.br/clojures-journey-at-nubank-a-look-into-the-future/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; jayceedenton</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jayceedenton</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://building. nubank.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/8-1024x683.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Clojure 编程语言的创建者 Rich Hickey 已从 Nubank 退休。尽管退休，Nubank 仍然致力于 Clojure 并将继续支持其开发。<a href="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/#rich-hickey-is-retiring-from-nubank" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=37000733" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;85字节贪吃蛇游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/donno2048/snake</id>; <updated>;2023-08-04T13:53:39.923041Z</updated >; <link href="https://github.com/donno2048/snake"/>; <作者>; <name>;bundie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bundie< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;您可以查看在线演示（在电脑上使用方向键或在移动设备上滑动） sudo apt update sudo apt install dosbox nasm -y git clone https:// github.com/donno2048/snake cd Snake nasm Snake.asm -o Snake.com -f bin dosbox -c "周期 1" -c“挂载c”。 -c "c:" -c“蛇” <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#85-byte-snake-game" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36999463" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;ImPlot：交互式绘图库，ImGui 风格</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/epezent/implot</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T14:53: 39.923902Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/epezent/implot"/>; <作者>; <name>;aroseunsaid</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=aroseunsaid</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wiki/epezent/implot/screenshots3/controls.gif" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：132 像素；” />;<br />;ImPlot 是 Dear ImGui 的即时模式、GPU 加速绘图库。它旨在提供 ImGui 粉丝喜爱的一流 API。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#implot-interactive-plotting-library-imgui-style" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37000594" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;树皮甲虫正在吞噬德国的哈茨森林</stitle>; <id>;https://apnews.com/article/climate-germany-bark-beetles-harz-spruce- 2211332b8e841ad18fc16267bcbec6dc</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T13:53:39.924799Z</更新>; <link href="https://apnews.com/article/climate-germany-bark-beetles-harz-spruce-2211332b8e841ad18fc16第267章"/>; <author>; <name>;geox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://dims.apnews.com/dims4/default/f4dbc94/2147483647/strip/true/crop/4733x3153+0+1/resize/599x399!/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F %2Fassets.apnews.com%2F36%2Fc7%2F55885400da833e25d01b46c6b7f5%2Fa39490dcf01749d4be7755c66634ed84" style="宽度：220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;树皮甲虫对德国哈尔茨森林造成了严重破坏，三分之二的云杉树已经被毁。由于夏季干燥和人为造成的高温，甲虫大量繁殖气候变化。森林保护主义者正在努力控制害虫，并正在考虑种植其他能够更好地抵御这些条件的树种。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bark-beetles-are-eating-through -germanys-harz-forest" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36999936" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;单周期 64 位 RISC -V 注册文件</stitle>; <id>;https://danielmangum.com/posts/single-cycle-rv64-register-file/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T14:53:39.925542Z</已更新>; <link href="https://danielmangum.com/posts/single-cycle-rv64-register-file/"/>; <作者>; <name>;hasheddan</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=hasheddan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://danielmangum.com/static/moss_single_regfile_0.png" style="width: 220px ; height: 121px;" />;<br />;在单周期处理器中，由于物理世界的连续性，对同一寄存器的读写是一个挑战。寄存器文件，控制以最快的速度读写机器中的内存是处理器中的关键组件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-single-cycle-64-bit-risc-v-register-file" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37000144" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ Entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;教一个人进行网络钓鱼，他就可以终生</stitle>; <id>;https ://krebsonsecurity.com/2023/08/teach-a-man-to-phish-and-hes-set-for-life/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T13:53:39.926320Z</已更新>; <link href="https://krebsonsecurity.com/2023/08/teach-a-man-to-phish-and-hes-set-for-life/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://krebsonsecurity.com/ wp-content/uploads/2023/08/lme-phish.png" style="width: 220px; height: 133px;" />;<br />;电子邮件网络钓鱼诈骗者正在使用老伎俩来欺骗用户，例如附加网络钓鱼电子邮件以清理邮件并伪装恶意文件。一个例子是使用从右到左覆盖的网络钓鱼诈骗字符使 .eml 文件显示为 .PDF 文件。该骗局还利用 LinkedIn 上的开放重定向将用户发送到模仿 Microsoft 的网络钓鱼页面，并试图窃取电子邮件凭据。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#teach-a-man-to-phish-and-hes-set-for-life" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=37000029" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;康卡斯特、Centurylink 未能破坏犹他州社区拥有的千兆光纤网络</stitle>; <id>;https://www.techdirt.com/2023/08/04/comcast- centurylink -fail-to-derail-community-owned-gigabit-optical-network-in-bountiful-utah/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T15:30:39.927076Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.techdirt.com/2023/08/04/comcast- centurylink-fail-to-derail-community-owned-gigabit-optical-network-in-bountiful-utah/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; rntn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www. techdirt.com/wp-content/themes/techdirt/assets/images/footer-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 181px;" />;<br />;在区域电信垄断企业数十年的掠夺行为、缓慢的速度和高昂的价格之后，美国各地 600 多个社区决定建立自己的宽带网络。犹他州邦蒂富尔市，投票决定建设耗资 4800 万美元的光纤网络，为该市的每个企业和住宅提供价格实惠的千兆位宽带。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#comcast- centurylink-fail-to-derail-utah -community-owned-gigabit-optical-network" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37001369" target="_blank" >;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;绘制埃菲尔铁塔</stitle>; <id>;https://www.toureiffel.paris/en/the-monument/painting-eiffel-tower</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T11:53:39.927761Z</更新>; < link href="https://www.toureiffel.paris/en/the-monument/painting-eiffel-tower"/>; <作者>; <名称>;redbell</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=redbell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.toureiffel.paris/sites/default/files/styles/mobile_x1_560/public/ 2017-11/070301-045.JPEG?itok=VxaDWgyA" style="width: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;重新粉刷活动是纪念碑生命中的一个重要事件，与与埃菲尔铁塔相关的一切一样，呈现出真正的神话性质。它代表了作品的持久品质。已知的艺术... <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#painting-the-eiffel-tower" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36998337" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Overtone – Clojure 中的可编程现场音乐</stitle>; <id>;https://overtone.github.io</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T13 :53:39.929752Z</updated>; <link href="https://overtone.github.io"/>; <作者>; <name>;elamje</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=elamje</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://overtone.github.io/media/spira2.png" style="width: 220px; height: 150px;" />;<br />;Overtone 是一个开源音频环境，旨在探索新的音乐创意。它将 SuperCollider 音频引擎与 Clojure 相结合，创建交互式声音体验。 <a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#overtone-programmable-live-music-in-clojure" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36988012" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Andrew McCalip 演示了 LK99 的合成</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/andrewmccalip/status/1687405505604734978</id>; <updated>;2023-08-04T10:53:39.930414Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/andrewmccalip/status/1687405505604734978"/>; <作者>; <name>;gabesullice</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gabesullice </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要担心 - 让我们再试一次。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#andrew- mccalip-demonstrates-synthesis-of-lk99" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36997821" target="_blank">; [comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FCC 对跨国非法抢劫操作</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.fcc.gov/public/attachments/DOC-395728A1.txt</id>; <updated>;2023-08-04T12:53:39.931111Z</updated >; <link href="https://docs.fcc.gov/public/attachments/DOC-395728A1.txt"/>; <作者>; <name>;kimi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=kimi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;美国联邦通信委员会 (FCC) 对一项跨国非法自动呼叫操作处以创纪录的 299,997,000 美元罚款。该行动向超过 5 亿个电话号码发出了超过 50 亿次自动呼叫，违反了联邦法规和 FCC 的规定。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fcc-imposes-record-penalty-against-transnational-illegal-robocalling-operation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36999016" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;奥地利领导人提议将现金的使用写入国家宪法</stitle>; <id>;https://apnews.com/article/austria-cash -constitution-proposal-e63078b1682b375a84d0132857374e43</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T14:53:39.931787Z</更新>; <link href="https://apnews.com/article/austria-cash-constitution-proposal- e63078b1682b375a84d0132857374e43"/>; <作者>; <名称>;justin66</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=justin66</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://dims.apnews.com/dims4/default/f908ca7/2147483647/strip/true/crop/4180x2784+0+1/resize/599x399!/quality/90/?url=https%3A% 2F%2Fassets.apnews.com%2F5e%2Fd2%2F14b199b1f0c51f09842e0e6ca3a0%2F05980fbe60e34fd490321b7449cbc8fe" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;由于担心现金作为支付手段可能受到限制，奥地利领导人提议将使用现金的权利写入国家宪法。该提案旨在保护现金作为一种支付手段支付并与奥地利中央银行合作确保基本的现金供应。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#austrian-leader-proposes-enshrining-the-use-of-cash-in-country -s-constitution" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37000250" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;发现阿尔卑斯山以北最早的玻璃作坊</ stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-07-earliest-glass-workshop-north-alps.html</id>; <updated>;2023-08-04T10:53:39.932479Z</updated >; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-07-earliest-glass-workshop-north-alps.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;Petiver</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Petiver</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/ 800a/2023/earliest-glass-worksho.jpg" style="宽度：220px;高度：146px;" />;<br />;经过20年的地面勘察，考古学家挖掘了著名的铁器时代遗址Němčice，并确认了阿尔卑斯山以北最早的玻璃作坊的存在。Němčice是最古老的玻璃作坊之一。中欧拉泰恩时期（公元前 3 至 2 世纪）的重要定居点，以其空前数量的黄金而闻名，数量超过 2,000 颗。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#earliest- glass-workshop-north-of-the-alps-discovered" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;土星是一颗失败的气态巨行星吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.14740</id>; <updated>;2023-08 -04T11：53：39.933161Z </更新>; <link href =“https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.14740”/>; <作者>; <名称>;looperhacks </名称>; <uri>;https://news。 ycombinator.com/user?id=looperhacks</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/ arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;巨行星的形成历史仍然未知。失控气体吸积是在质量约为 100 M_Earth 时开始的，对应于向气态巨行星的过渡。土星可能从未达到失控气体吸积并被认为是一颗“失败的巨行星”。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#is-saturn-a-failed-gas-giant" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36998554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;南美洲冬季气温超过 35 摄氏度，令气候学家难以置信</stitle>; <id>;https://www.abc.net .au/news/2023-08-04/south-america-extreme-heat-mid-winter-climate-change-scientists/102678662</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T13:53:39.933839Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.abc.net.au/news/2023-08-04/south-america-extreme-heat-mid-winter-climate-change-scientists/102678662"/>; <作者>; <name>;hnuser0000</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hnuser0000</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //live- Production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/147644613ce5ce2d9bc49ac0acc3c3b5?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=960&cropW=1706&xPos=0&yPos=10&width=862&height=485" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;南美洲部分地区的冬季气温已接近 40 摄氏度，这让气候科学家感到惊讶。智利和智利的这个时候的气温比正常水平高出 10 到 20 摄氏度。阿根廷。极端热浪被认为是南半球有史以来最强烈的冬季热浪之一。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#winter-temporals-above-35c-in-south-america -leave-climatologies-in-disbelief" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36999338" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Mozilla VPN：CVE-2023 -4104：vpndaemon错误地实现了Polkit身份验证</stitle>; <id>;https://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2023/08/03/1</id>; <updated>;2023-08-04T08 :53:39.934499Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2023/08/03/1"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rkta</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rkta</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Linux 上的 Mozilla VPN 客户端存在损坏且不完整的 Polkit 身份验证检查，允许任意本地用户配置 VPN 设置并可能将网络流量重定向到恶意方。还缺少对其他 D-Bus 方法的 Polkit 身份验证检查，这可能导致信息泄露和未经授权的操作。建议的修复措施包括实施正确的多用户身份验证和限制 VPN 守护程序的权限。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mozilla-vpn-cve-2023-4104-vpndaemon-wrongly-implements-polkit-authentication" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36997067" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PicoLisp 教程</stitle>; <id>;https://picolisp-explored.com</id>; <更新>;2023-08- 04T05:53:39.935836Z</updated>; <link href="https://picolisp-explored.com"/>; <author>; <name>;damir</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=damir</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1630491832579/OatYIDN2Z.png ？w=800&h=420&fit=crop&crop=entropy&auto=压缩，format&format=webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;关于 PicoLisp 整个生态系统的博客 - 教程、实际项目、函数式编程理论。查看 https://gitlab.com/picolisp-blog 了解来源等。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#picolisp-tutorials" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36995944" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;如果您对 FDA 的麻木状态有第一手了解，请联系</stitle>; <id>;https://jakeseliger.com/2023/08/02/if-youre-involved-in-drug -development-and-have-first-hand-knowledge-of-the-fdas-torpor-get-in-touch/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T00:53:39.936526Z</更新>; <链接href="https://jakeseliger.com/2023/08/02/if-youre-involved-in-drug-development-and-have-first-hand-knowledge-of-the-fdas-torpor-get-in -touch/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;abecedarius</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=abecedarius</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://jseliger.files.wordpress.com/2023/08/dsf4285.jpg?w=1024" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;如果您参与药物或医疗开发并经历过 FDA 的麻木不仁，请考虑匿名联系。许多对 FDA 的缓慢和缺乏反应能力有第一手了解的人都不愿说出来，担心遭到报复。目前正在进行改革，鼓励有直接经验的人分享他们的故事。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#if-you-have-first-hand-knowledge-of-the-fdas-torpor-get-in-touch" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36973736" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何增强肌肉</stitle>; <id>;https://www.julian.com/guide/肌肉/介绍</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T15:04:39.937224Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.julian.com/guide/muscle/intro"/>; <作者>; <name>;mutant_glofish</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mutant_glofish</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /assets.website-files.com/54a5a40be53a05f34703dd18/5c7c13deee88073535b9c59e_Muscle%20Open%20Graph.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;文章探讨了增肌的过程，为经过一定时间的锻炼后能够达到的肌肉质量提供了现实的参考。它还解决了女性对体质和使用类固醇来获得更大肌肉质量的偏好。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-build-muscle" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=37001003" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;“ping”输出中的“pipe”值意味着什么？ （2009）</stitle>; <id>;http://web.archive.org/web/20130302161137/http://www.vincentverhagen.nl/2009/06/13/what-does-the-pipe-value- mean-in-the-output-of-ping/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T00:53:39.937914Z</更新>; <link href="http://web.archive.org/web/ 20130302161137/http://www.vincentverhagen.nl/2009/06/13/what-does-the-pipe-value-mean-in-the-output-of-ping/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;luu </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;使用 ping 命令时，中的 'pipe' 值rtt 统计信息表示已发送但未收到回复的回显请求数据包的最大数量。当在回答先前的回显请求之前发送多个回显请求时，该值会增加。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-does-the-pipe-value-mean-in-the-output-of-ping-2009" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36983841" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;苏格兰启蒙运动与现代历史的重塑</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cambridge.org /core/journals/historical-journal/article/scottish-enlightenment-and-the-remaking-of-modern-history/ED61FD3E65AAB0DA630A325DF14F6E8B</id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T09:53:39.938623Z</更新>; < link href="https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/historical-journal/article/scottish-enlightenment-and-the-remaking-of-modern-history/ED61FD3E65AAB0DA630A325DF14F6E8B"/>; <作者>; <姓名>; pepys</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pepys</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload. wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/a/a9/Google_Scholar_logo_2015.PNG" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：85 像素；" />;<br />;本文对苏格兰启蒙运动时期的历史写作提供了新的解读。它认为，在 1745 年雅各布派叛乱被归咎于苏格兰的“封建”制度之后，苏格兰法学家和历史学家开始质疑“现代”意味着什么。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-scottish-enlightenment-and-the-remaking-of-modern-history" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36989424" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;全球最大的在线烤面包机展览会</stitle>; <id>;http://toastermuseum.com</id>; <更新>;2023-08- 04T05:53:39.939287Z</updated>; <link href="http://toastermuseum.com"/>; <作者>; <name>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;有人收集烤面包机的消息常常会导致同样的反应：尴尬的停顿，紧张的笑声，然后："...烤面包机？ "问题不在于收集烤面包机。问题是，有数百个。结果：他们只是说你疯了。好吧，有时我认为他们是对的！ <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-worlds-largest-online-toaster-exhibition" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36992802" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;公共图书馆即将到来的 Enshittification</stitle>; <id>;https://kararawynn.substack.com/p/the-coming-enshittification-of-public-libraries< /id>; <更新>;2023-08-04T11:53:39.939938Z</更新>; <link href="https://kararawynn.substack.com/p/the-coming-enshittification-of-public-libraries"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;mrzool</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mrzool</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Ffd62fe2d -b96a-48ca-a889-d2b86495a374_1920x1234.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：142px；" />;<br />;美国的公共图书馆正面临多重威胁，包括禁书和未成年人进入限制。然而，还有一个经常被忽视的威胁：资本主义的实事化。这是指平台将自身利润置于用户需求之上而导致质量和价值下降的过程。 OverDrive 平台垄断了北美公共图书馆的电子书和有声读物管理业务，最近取消了用户向图书馆推荐图书的功能，这可能会限制对新书的访问。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-coming-enshittification-of-public-libraries" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36998643" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
